title: sparql/query
description: A sparql query received on the triplet store backends (e.g. query.wikidata.org)

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema_name/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

http.description: Information about the HTTP request that generated an event.

method.description: The HTTP request method (GET, POST, etc.)

request_headers.description: Request headers sent by the client.

response_headers.description: Response headers sent back to the client (when known).

has_cookies.description: True if the HTTP request has any cookies set

status_code.description: The HTTP status code returned for this request (when known)

backend_host.description: Hostname of sparql endpoint (blazegraph) server handling this sparql query

namespace.description: Name of the database being requested

format.description: the format requested (overrides the Accept header if set)

params.description: Request parameters. Usually from the HTTP query string or in the request body if the POST method is used. Note that the query and format params are not duplicated in this property.
